topics.body:
That Zyuranger cover is a good idea in concept. The Top emphasizing that It's the source of power rangers, And The cover showing the japanese actors and their base of operations. 

But They just made it so ugly looking. (Why the japanese logo in blue? Why is Zyuranger shoved onto the bottom? Why put the super sentai logo over the title of the specific installment? And what's with the font on it?)

"@twistedmetalero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/544978806368720c2d990200#post_544978806368720c2d990200
I'm not going to lie; I can understand why you don't want to talk in the gg thread.  You obviously know I'm very much pro-gg, but sometimes I just peek into the thread and see the intelligence of the discussions going on is dropping.  No offense to anyone, but christ guys gamergate is a consumer revolt not a fucking war so stop beating the war drums.  Fortunately every time Niggoslav visits he bumps the discussion up several dozen IQ points so it kind of balances out.

topics.body:
Hey guys, what kind of tanks do you think would suit Equestria if it was developing its military around the 1930s level of military? I've got this idea for a story nearly done, but I'm not sure if I should be making them more militaristic, or not. 

But if I do push towards making them more militaristic, development of their industry and technology should be around WWII. I mean they've got electricity and very crappy computers, that puts them way ahead of 1940. Though its going to need a  bit more refinement. 

Also Black Prince (tank) vs Sturmgeschütz IV, which would win?
